summary: An ordinance relating to, and providing for, the employment of James H. Schack, A. M. Young and David J. Myers, co-partners doing business as Schack, Young & Myers, as architects, in connection with the construction, furnishing and equipping of the public auditorium, arena and recreation field contemplated by Ordinances Nos. 52296 and 52855; authorizing the execution of an agreement in respect thereto, and authorizing expenditures therefor.
